Text.text: Registering your Product with SAP Usage Tracking tool
You use this procedure to register your product to the Usage Tracking tracking for data collection purposes.
Launch the Usage Tracking application using the following URL
In the landing page, choose Add New Product.
In the Product Onboarding Details pane, provide the product details.
By default, the tool allows to collect the basic information. The default data collection involves information given below:

If you want to collect the additional product info, like product feature related information or any extra event data, select the Custom Configuration checkbox and choose Proceed to add and model custom details.
